'''Forest Essential Oil''' is a potion that can be crafted through a [[Crafting Bench]]. It is used to increase all party members' {{Color|Dendro DMG}}.

==Alchemy==
{{Recipe
|type = Crafting
|Lizard Tail = 1
|Sumeru Rose = 1
